text: "Lonesome Loser" is a 1979 song by Australian band Little River Band and taken from their fifth studio album First Under the Wire. It went to number 3 in Canada, number 6 in the United States and number 19 in Australia. ==Track listing== ; Australian 7" (Capitol Records – CP-11972) :A. "Lonesome Loser" - 3:30 :B. "Another Runway" - 6:28 ;US 7" single (Capitol Records – 4748) :A. "Lonesome Loser" - 3:59 :B. "Shut Down Turn Off" - 3:50 Category:1979 songs Category:Little River Band songs
title: Lonesome Loser
